name: AllGreenOrganic
description: ## This app facilitates  ### Customers. 	To add items from store to the cart. 	Chooses when the cart is required. 	Chooses the delivery mechanism. ### Farmers. 	To add items to store. 	Withdraw product, may be seasonally. ### Delivery Mechanisms. 	Customer pickup the bucket. 	UberDeliver. ### Review Process. ### Manager. 	Low stock 	Option for using the produce that is about to expire. 	Donation and get tax credit to farmer, with farmers consent. 	Composting and provide that to farmers or nursery.
